title: Bug 18934: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled but they do not have any effect. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image such as an icon, as the scrollbars do not function.
OB: Open the ImageAnalyzer example. Notice the enabled scrollbars that do not have any effect, even when moving them around. This issue is observed in build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only).
SR: Disable the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example to accurately reflect their functionality. This will prevent confusion and provide a better user experience.
